title: borgiatrade
author: borgiatrade
content: I need to buy usdt using my debit cardIs there any online service that accepts debit cards ?Best Regards

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Well, most exchanges should accept that, but the question is whether you're willing to go through the ID verification process. If not, then you're probably not going to find any and if you do, it's going to be for outrageous fees.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: borgiatrade on June 12, 2023, 01:39:26 PMI need to buy usdt using my debit cardIs there any online service that accepts debit cards ?Best RegardsUse Binance exchange. Clarify first if you preferred KYC because this will make your buying experience easier. Binance offer debit card purchase in both P2P and or their buy with Fiat. Binance accepts multiple country so you will have no problem if your country is not that strict.You can try also agoradesk.com if you have an online account for your debit card to transfer funds.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: borgiatrade on June 12, 2023, 01:39:26 PMI need to buy usdt using my debit cardIs there any online service that accepts debit cards ?Best RegardsI could not understand why you are not trying an online exchange service. You can use a lot of exchange site that accepts International debit/credit card to buy crypto from their site. You may have a look at Binance as well as Coinbase. But for both case, you must have your own card.
